text: Marie Bernard is a scientist. Marie Bernanrd may also refer to: *Marie Bernard (composer) (born 1951), Canadian composer who won at the 12th Genie Awards *Marie Bernard (child saint) on List of child saints *Sister Mary Bernard or Bernadette Soubirous, saint *Marie Françoise Bernard (1819–1901), credited as the father of physiology
title: Marie Bernard (disambiguation)
